channel.title: Halloween on Losinggeneration Coding Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Halloween on Losinggeneration Coding Blog

item.title: Halloween Theme
item.description: First off, I’m a big fan of Halloween to begin with, and I was kind of on the ropes if I should do a Halloween theme for this month or not. Well as you can tell, my girlfriend talked me into using this theme. Honestly, I do quite enjoy how it does quotes. When the month is over I think I know what theme I’ll be using for the foreseeable future.
